about_the_game: Protocol: First Attack stands out as a competitive FPS war game. Players try to gain an advantage over their opponents by using strategic team fights and sniper skills. The game, which has a fast-paced, skill-requiring and strategy-oriented structure, offers a multiplayer experience enriched with various maps and equipment options. Players find themselves in exciting conflicts by cooperating with their teammates in different game modes.
detailed_description: Protocol: First Attack stands out as a competitive FPS war game. Players try to gain an advantage over their opponents by using strategic team fights and sniper skills. The game, which has a fast-paced, skill-requiring and strategy-oriented structure, offers a multiplayer experience enriched with various maps and equipment options. Players find themselves in exciting conflicts by cooperating with their teammates in different game modes.
name: Protocol: First Attack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: 4 fiziksel işlemci iş parçacığı - Intel® Core™ i5 750 veya üstü
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Ekran kartı en az 1 GB veya daha fazla belleğe sahip olmalıdır ve Shader Model 5.0 desteklemenin yanı sıra DirectX 11 uyumlu olmalıdır.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10 - 11
  • Processor: 4 fiziksel işlemci iş parçacığı - Intel® Core™ i5 750 veya üstü
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Ekran kartı en az 1 GB veya daha fazla belleğe sahip olmalıdır ve Shader Model 5.0 desteklemenin yanı sıra DirectX 11 uyumlu olmalıdır.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Protocol: First Attack is a fast-paced and strategy-focused FPS war game. Players must demonstrate their tactical prowess by collaborating with teammates to gain an advantage over their opponents. It offers an exciting multiplayer experience with different maps and equipment options.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
